= Ubuntu =

Supported versions *Karmic Koala (9.10)* and *Lucid Lynx (10.04)*


=== Adding to the repository ===

When installing the software for the first time you need to add a configuration file to the repository and import the GPG key.


=== Karmic Koala (9.10) ===
{{{
echo deb http://id.smartlink.ee/repo/release/ubuntu/ karmic main | sudo dd of=/etc/apt/sources.list.d/idkaart.list
wget http://id.smartlink.ee/repo/apt-esteid-test.gpg.asc -O - | sudo apt-key add -
}}}

=== Lucid Lynx (10.04) ===
{{{
echo deb http://id.smartlink.ee/repo/release/ubuntu/ lucid main | sudo dd of=/etc/apt/sources.list.d/idkaart.list
wget http://id.smartlink.ee/repo/apt-esteid-test.gpg.asc -O - | sudo apt-key add -
}}}

=== Installing packages ===

To install all packages you need to enter the following commands into the terminal:
{{{
sudo aptitude update
sudo aptitude dist-upgrade
sudo aptitude install qdigidoc qesteidutil mozilla-esteid thunderbird-esteid openoffice.org-digidoc
}}}

If the packages have already been installed before then to update them enter the following commands into the terminal:
{{{
sudo aptitude update
sudo aptitude dist-upgrade
}}}
